thread.section_title: VelvetJobs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of VelvetJobs | velvetjobs.com
thread.title: Jessica Garcia

author: Jessica Garcia
title: Jessica Garcia
text:
I had such a great experience with VelvetJobs and I would highly recommend them
to anyone. Steve and Christina were so helpful and professional. I always got a prompt response. My resume and cover letter turned out better than I expected and I got such great advice along the way. I didn't just get a great resume and cover letter - they showed me a new way of looking at my professional experience that made me so much more confident in my abilities. It had made my job search so much less stressful!
